title: Best of The Program | Guests: Dr. Robert Malone & Alan Dershowitz
description:
The NFL says that “football is gay” in a new woke ad campaign. Dr. Robert Malone comes back to discuss the ethics of DNA manipulation as talk of engineering humans to stop eating meat begins to float around. Attorney Alan Dershowitz calls in with his thoughts on why New York’s decision to revoke Rudy Giuliani’s license to practice law should disturb every lawyer.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
